verses.verse: Finally <S%G3063><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>. To write <S%G1125><s%> the same things <S%G846><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%>, to me <S%G1698><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> grievous <S%G3636><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> for you <S%G5213><s%> it is safe <S%G804><s%>.
Beware <S%G991><s%> of dogs <S%G2965><s%>, beware <S%G991><s%> of evil <S%G2556><s%> workers <S%G2040><s%>, beware <S%G991><s%> of the concision <S%G2699><s%>.

Though <S%G2539><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> might <S%G2192><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> confidence <S%G4006><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>. If any <S%G1536><s%> other man <S%G243><s%> thinketh <S%G1380><s%> that he hath whereof he might trust <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> more <S%G3123><s%>:

Concerning <S%G2596><s%> zeal <S%G2205><s%>, persecuting <S%G1377><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%>; touching <S%G2596><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, <S%G1096><s%> blameless <S%G273><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> what things <S%G3748><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> gain <S%G2771><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%>, those <S%G5023><s%> I counted <S%G2233><s%> loss <S%G2209><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

Yea <S%G235><s%> doubtless <S%G3304><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I count <S%G2233><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> but loss <S%G2209><s%> for <S%G1511><s%> <S%G1223><s%> the excellency <S%G5242><s%> of the knowledge <S%G1108><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>: for <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have suffered the loss <S%G2210><s%> of all things <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> do count <S%G2233><s%> them <S%G1511><s%> but dung <S%G4657><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I may win <S%G2770><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> be found <S%G2147><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> mine own <S%G1699><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is of <S%G1537><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> is through <S%G1223><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>:

That I may know <S%G1097><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> resurrection <S%G386><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> sufferings <S%G3804><s%>, being made conformable <S%G4833><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>;
If by any means <S%G1513><s%> I might attain <S%G2658><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the resurrection <S%G1815><s%> of the dead <S%G3498><s%>.

Not <S%G3756><s%> as though <S%G3754><s%> I had already <S%G2235><s%> attained <S%G2983><s%>, either <S%G2228><s%> were already <S%G2235><s%> perfect <S%G5048><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> I follow after <S%G1377><s%>, if <S%G1499><s%> that I may apprehend <S%G2638><s%> that for <S%G1909><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> I am apprehended <S%G2638><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

Brethren <S%G80><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> count <S%G3049><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> to have apprehended <S%G2638><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> this one thing <S%G1520><s%> I do, forgetting <S%G1950><s%> those things <S%G3303><s%> which are behind <S%G3694><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> reaching forth unto <S%G1901><s%> those things which are before <S%G1715><s%>,

I press <S%G1377><s%> toward <S%G2596><s%> the mark <S%G4649><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> the prize <S%G1017><s%> of the high <S%G507><s%> calling <S%G2821><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

Let <S%G5426><s%> us therefore <S%G3767><s%>, as many as <S%G3745><s%> be perfect <S%G5046><s%>, be <S%G5426><s%> thus <S%G5124><s%> minded <S%G5426><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> if in any thing <S%G1536><s%> ye be <S%G5426><s%> otherwise <S%G2088><s%> minded <S%G5426><s%>, God <S%G2316><s%> shall reveal <S%G601><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%>, whereto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> we have already attained <S%G5348><s%>, let us walk <S%G4748><s%> by the same <S%G846><s%> rule <S%G2583><s%>, let us mind <S%G5426><s%> the same thing <S%G846><s%>.

Brethren <S%G80><s%>, be <S%G1096><s%> followers together <S%G4831><s%> of me <S%G3450><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> mark <S%G4648><s%> them which walk <S%G4043><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> for an ensample <S%G5179><s%>.

(For <S%G1063><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%>, of whom <S%G3739><s%> I have told <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> often <S%G4178><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> you even <S%G2532><s%> weeping <S%G2799><s%>, that they are the enemies <S%G2190><s%> of the cross <S%G4716><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>:

Whose <S%G3739><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> is destruction <S%G684><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is their belly <S%G2836><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> whose glory <S%G1391><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> shame <S%G152><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> mind <S%G5426><s%> earthly things <S%G1919><s%>.)

For <S%G1063><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> conversation <S%G4175><s%> is <S%G5225><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>; from <S%G1537><s%> whence <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we look for <S%G553><s%> the Saviour <S%G4990><s%>, the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>: conversation: or, we live or conduct ourselves as citizens of heaven, or, for obtaining heaven
